# Adaptation Atlas V1 Notebooks

<style>
/* Notebook index tiles */
  .notebook-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(260px, 1fr));
    gap: 1.25rem;
    margin: 1.5rem 0 2.5rem;
  }

  .notebook-grid__empty {
    padding: 1rem 1.25rem;
    border: 1px dashed var(--atlasLightGray);
    border-radius: 12px;
    color: var(--atlasDarkGray);
    background: #f8f8f8;
  }

  main a.notebook-card {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    height: 100%;
    background: #fff;
    border: 1px solid var(--atlasLightGray);
    border-radius: 16px;
    overflow: hidden;
    color: #0f1912;
    text-decoration: none;
    box-shadow: 0 14px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
    transition: transform 180ms ease, box-shadow 180ms ease, border-color 180ms ease;
  }

  .notebook-card:focus-visible,
  .notebook-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-6px);
    border-color: var(--atlasGreen);
    box-shadow: 0 16px 45px rgba(46, 118, 54, 0.22);
  }

  main a.notebook-card,
  main a.notebook-card:hover,
  main a.notebook-card:focus-visible,
  .notebook-card * {
    text-decoration: none !important;
  }

  .notebook-card__image {
    position: relative;
    padding-top: 58%;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
  }

  .notebook-card__body {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 0.35rem;
    padding: 1rem 1.25rem 1.25rem;
  }

  .notebook-card__badge {
    align-self: flex-start;
    padding: 0.25rem 0.6rem;
    border-radius: 999px;
    background: rgba(46, 118, 54, 0.12);
    color: var(--atlasGreen);
    font-size: 0.8rem;
    letter-spacing: 0.08em;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .notebook-card__title {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: 1.15rem;
    color: #0f1912;
  }

  .notebook-card__subtitle {
    margin: 0;
    color: #3b4a3f;
    font-size: 1rem;
  }

  .notebook-card__summary {
    margin: 0.25rem 0 0;
    color: #313d34;
    font-size: 0.98rem;
    line-height: 1.5;
  }

  .notebook-card__cta {
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.35rem;
    margin-top: 0.6rem;
    color: var(--atlasGreen);
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: 0.95rem;
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  .notebook-card__cta::after {
    content: ">";
    font-size: 0.9rem;
  }
</style>

<div id="notebook-grid" class="notebook-grid" aria-live="polite"></div>
<p id="notebook-grid-empty" class="notebook-grid__empty" hidden>
  No notebooks have been configured yet.
</p>

<script>
  (async () => {
    const grid = document.getElementById("notebook-grid");
    const empty = document.getElementById("notebook-grid-empty");

    try {
      const response = await fetch("notebooks.json");
      if (!response.ok) throw new Error("Unable to load notebook list.");

      const data = await response.json();
      const notebooks = (
        Array.isArray(data)
          ? data
          : Array.isArray(data?.notebooks)
          ? data.notebooks
          : []
      ).filter((nb) => !nb.hide);

      if (!notebooks.length) {
        empty.hidden = false;
        return;
      }

      const cards = notebooks
        .map((nb) => {
          const image = nb.image || "images/default_crop.webp";
          const titleEn = (nb.title && nb.title.en) || nb.id || "Notebook";
          const summary = nb.summary && nb.summary.en;
          const href =
            typeof nb.path === "string"
              ? nb.path.replace(".qmd", ".html")
              : nb.path;

          return `
            <a class="notebook-card" href="${href}">
              <div class="notebook-card__image" style="background-image:
                linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(8, 20, 14, 0) 25%, rgba(8, 20, 14, 0.6) 100%),
                url('${image}')"></div>
              <div class="notebook-card__body">
                <h3 class="notebook-card__title">${titleEn}</h3>
                ${
                  summary
                    ? `<p class="notebook-card__summary">${summary}</p>`
                    : ""
                }
              </div>
            </a>
          `;
        })
        .join("");

      grid.innerHTML = cards;
    } catch (err) {
      empty.textContent = "Error loading notebooks. Please try again later.";
      empty.hidden = false;
      console.error(err);
    }
  })();
</script>
